c74object.name: somax.player.app
c74object.digest: Main generative object of the somax application
c74object.description: The somax.player.app is a wrapper around the somax.player, encapsulating it together with other useful tools for routing influences, rendering and playing back audio or MIDI output. The somax.player.app has a graphic interface to control all its parameters and provide the user with better interaction. Thanks to this app object, somax can send influences between influencers and players wirelessly (i.e. without max patch cords).
